name: .GAMBL
summary: Learn about .GAMBL files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

instructions: You can open GAMBL files with Vernier Graphical Analysis in Windows and macOS. To open a GAMBL file, select Open... from the file menu in Graphical Analysis.

Since GAMBL files store data in the XML standard, you can open the files with a text or XML editor. However, opening a GAMBL file with a text or XML editor will not display the data the same as opening it with Graphical Analysis.
Vernier Graphical Analysis can convert GAMBL files to several file types, including the following formats:
